activities.loc: JMB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Body Only Statewide

11:23 AM Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Isaac K Erickson not in court. State moves for warrant.  Court authorizes bench warrant, body only, statewide.

11:33 Case recalled as DE appears late.  DE relates he has not heard back from the public defender's office. Warrant is quashed.  Court relates PD has not yet appointed counsel.  Court enters pleas of NG and preserves all rights to pre-arraignment are reserved.  Court appoints Michelle Erdman as counsel and sets hearing for 9/9/2022 at 3:00 PM.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

NOTICE OF HEARING RETURNED for 06/15/2022 @ 11:00 a.m.

9:45 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Isaac K Erickson appeared by video.
Defendant to contact Public Defender's office. Court in recess.
10:50 Case recalled. Qualifies for Public Defender. Next hearing may be by zoom. Defendant does not have a phone.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 

Must have no contact with C.N.K. dob 03/12/2004.
Must have no contact with A.D.D. dob 05/22/1974.

1:06 PM Defendant Isaac K Erickson appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Isaac K Erickson for today only.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 4, 2022 at 10:00 am.  1:27 p.m. case recalled.  State moves to quash warrant.  Court quashes warrant.
